Samiba Craftsman

--- Jason Coan <COANJ@...> wrote:
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> The guy I bought my Shaped Oak single cam bow from,
> offered to try to make me a darkwood single cam,
> said he succeeded about 1 in 5, failed twice, and
> was un-willing to try a 3rd time due to money.
> Stats were something along the lines of 20 damage,
> 150 range, 35 delay (best I remember)
>
> BTW, I'm still looking for a double cam bow, and
> high damage long range arrows, will pay very well.
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Veeshan
>
> >>> "Ben Sarsgard (1)" <bens@...> 6.14.99
> 2:25:55 PM >>>
> From: "Ben Sarsgard (1)" <bens@...>
>
> Okay, I just signed up for this list a few
> hours ago, and I haven't seen one mail yet, so I'll
> see if I can start something up (and check if it is
> actually working). I'm Slig (level 8 wood elf
> ranger) on povar. I was talking with a friend, and
> we were wondering if anyone has ever made a darkwood
> bow, and, if so, what are the stats?
>
>
